|footnotes = }} 'Orkan-e Tork' (; also known as 'Organ-e Tork') is a
village in Khandan Rural District, Tarom Sofla District, Qazvin County, Qazvin
Province, Iran. At the 2006 census, its population was 131, in 35
families.
